captions.text:
I was so young then 
I only saw you

I don’t need anything 
If we could be together

We fought so much
Because of insignificant things

If I think about it now 
I can only laugh

Sometimes I’m dying 
to hear your news

But now we our relationship
Is not like that any more

I sometimes think of you
And miss you too much

But I’m going to cover it up
As beautiful memories

First love, my love 
that can’t be forgotten

Why does it 
hurt so much

I only remember you
I cry out for first love

Until my voice 
can get to you
Always

Hello, that one word is so difficult 
I couldn't call you up

Sorry I wasn't good enough to you 
I’m so sad about you

I can’t be in your arms anymore
Even in my dreams

Don’t’ be hurt again 
I’ll pray for you

The memories of the past linger
I can’t do anything
Why am I such a fool

I can’t forget 
my first love

Why does it 
hurt so much
I only remember you

I cry out for first love 
Until my voice can get to you
Always

I close my eyes right now 
Tears are falling right now

Why can’t I forget 
You like a fool
I’ll pray for you happiness

comments.text:
To every new fan out there: 0:12 it's Nana, 0:19 it's Uee, 0:21 it's 
Jooyeon and she just graduated so she's not in the group anymore right now, 
0:51 it's Raina she just had her solo debut check it!!, 1:07 it's E-Young, 
1:12 it's Kaeun the last member that joined the group,1:15 it's Lizzy and 
on the 23rd she will debut with a solo song!,1:26 it's JungAh the leader of 
the group. The girls will come back in march or in the 2nd half of the year 
so please anticipate both Lizzy's debut and After School's comeback!﻿
